resources.string: 1. Draw a line to create a margin

The moment when you get answer sheet put a margin on all pages at the right side of answer sheet about 2-3 cms wide with pencil. This will increase your presentation marks and your answer sheet will look more appealing.
2. Always try to make diagram for theory questions

Diagram can Fetch extra 1-2 marks for a question, Even if you dont know the theory points, a diagram can get you 1-2 marks and it is easy to remember diagram and elaborate it as compare to remembering 5-10 points.

When you see question paper. sometimes it seems you know the answer but when you arrive at that particular question and start writing you forget lot of points. Don’t waste time in thinking, switch to next question.

Leave some pages and continue with next question without wasting time, while writing next question if you remember the answer of previous question write in the space you have left. This will save your time which you can use for thinking about other left out questions.
By attempting more questions your chances of scoring marks increases, this may help you in passing the examination. Also follow above points to score good marks.

Dear students motive of exam is not only about studying and knowledge but also how you manage time and present your answer accordingly. Remember answers of question point-wise which will be easy for revision and also during exam can easily come to your mind.
Your mind must be relaxed before exam and try to think all answers that you studied. This will refine your answers more precisely and while writing won't have to think and invest more time.
8.Say no to group study before exam

Lot of students go for group study before 1 day of exam which is very bad idea. However if you are willing for group study do it before 3-4 days not 1 day before exam. It is of no use if you don’t revise it alone. Everybody understands in a different way and different time, so dear students study and revise alone 1 day before exams.
If you follow above tips be confident that you gonna score good marks in examination.
Your future is in your hands.

This app is primarily focussed for first year engineering students of Mumbai University however students of different universities can also refer this notes because more or less questions and syllabus are same.

This app contains 2 year solved questions papers under old syllabus of Mumbai University Dec 2016 and May 2016. All answers are given in point wise orientation so that students can understand well and also it is easy to remember during exams time.

Students will also receive notifications regarding exams and also students looking for internship can use this app which will give you regular updates. New and updated version of this app will be coming very soon which will have more contents and information for students.

The idea and development of this app is done by Mr. Ayush Kumar an ex student of Mumbai University of Pillai’s College, New Panvel. The motive was to help students during exams time so that they won’t have to spend time in gathering answers and can access notes at one stop.

The implementation of idea and other small miscellaneous work was done by Mr. Ashish Kumar. who helped our team in all stages of development, without his support it would not have been possible to develop this application.
The designing is done by Mr. Rahul Singh who helped me in visualisation and design of app to beautify it and look more appealing to the users.
Our website is developed by Mr. Shubham Damodar who is a proficient website developer and has graduated from Y.C. College , Mumbai.
Put your heart, mind, and soul into even your smallest acts. This is the secret of success.
